Currently one point above relegation, Fulham looked set to double that gap after Tom Cairney was fouled in the box late in stoppage time against West Ham.

articles.title: Keeper who ended Van Dijk’s season gets away with second horror tackle - Fox Sports
articles.description: Everton goalkeeper Jordan Pickford has once again escaped punishment for kicking out at an opposition player.
articles.content:
Pickford kicked Manchester United defender Harry Maguire above the knee as the latter attempted a shot in the 60th minute of Evertons 3-1 loss.
